data.actual_result: It doesn't, only when you are in a voice chat/call
data.expected_result: The auto detect should turns green when you are talking
data.short_description: The auto detect input sensitivity will not work when you are not in a call
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to settings - disable auto detect and see there's a gray bar that indicate the current db - enable auto detect and speak normally (or loudly)
